explains: n. 爆发；突围；越狱；脱逃

sentences.en: He is thought to have planned a prison breakout of militants suspected of the July bombing.
sentences.cn: 他被认为曾经策划了7月轰炸事件的嫌疑武力份子的越狱。

sentences.en: Home appliances will also become so smart that controlling andoperating them will result in the breakout of a new psychological disorder--kitchenrage.
sentences.cn: 家用电器也将变得非常智能化，以至于控制和操作它们将导致一种新的心理障碍的爆发——厨房狂躁症。
